fulltext:
Phuong, Bui Thi Mai
Date of birth:
 Sept 19,1988
Gender:  Female
Phone:  0904808811
Email:  phuong.buithimai@gmail.com
Address:
 Vinhome Thang long, Nam An Khanh,Hanoi, Vietnam
OBJECTIVE
I love working in marketing and PR fields. After finishing BA of Marketing at RMIT Vietnam , I had 2 years of
experience at PVC Group which was a very succesful and powerful group at that moment. I had contributed for
the company with passion and youth enthusiasm. 
For a while, i thought i needed a greater change on knowledge and career, i decided to go abroad and studied
Master of Marketing at University of Portsmouth, United Kingdom. Few years learning in professional and
developed countries, i found myseft confidence, bigger mind and better education.Finishing my master, i went
back to Vietnam and worked both in advertising agency and corporate in F&B fields. I had made my execellence
in applying knowledge to certain customer case. I am proud of being flexible and adaptable with changing
environment, understanding customer requirement, leading member in team thoroughly.I want to challenge
myself in new area, gain more knowledge because of the fast changing marketing world. I try to expert my self
on using online, offline tools to create effective plan. Therefore, i hope to work and contribute for a organisation
which give me chance to accellerate my abillity and passion.
EDUCATION
Oct 2011 - March 2013
University of Portsmouth, UK
Major: MA Marketing
GPA: Merit
Jan 2007 - Jan 2010
Royal Melbourne Institute of Technology, Australia- Campus Hanoi
Major: Bachelor of Commerce
GPA: 2.2/4
WORK EXPERIENCE
Apr 2017 - Present
Petrolinks, JSC
Marketing Manager
- The company has established on 2011, mainly a Pr- Advertising
agency.
- Pitching and presenting ideas with clients.
- Planning marketing master plan for company big clients such as
Viglacera, Domesco, Ha Long beer, Thang Long Cement, Loyal Spa
- Directing activation plan for single PR Campagin which related to
TVC, social investigation, online and offline media campagin for Canifa,
Redsun, Viettel, Foreign Trade University...
-  Expanding network, finding new client for company
 Expert on: team leader, director, consumer relationship,B2B, Planning
and activation.
 Oct 2016 - Mar 2017
Redsun Group
Brand Manager
- Redsun Group has more than 120 franchise restaurants over Vietnam
Managed marketing activities for 3 F&B brands which are BUKBUK,
CAPRICIOSA, DOLPANSAM. The company has 12 restaurants of
these brands.
- Trade marketing plan in order to up sale quarterly and yearly, and
special event for holiday or grand opening
- Reported after launching based on KPI
- Teamed work with designer, digital  and offline POSM manufacturer
 Expert on: team leader, KPI managerment, POSM activition
Aug 2015 - Oct 2016
Zaan, JSC
Operation Manager
- Managed drink chains which has two brands  MANGO MANIA và
GREEN MANGO. They are franchised from Thailand.
 - Plan online marketing plan such as food online network ( foody, Lozi),
Facebook marketing and online press website.
- Team work with POS manager, inventory manager and accountant to
run the business
- Product development for each location
- Advisor for employee training department to increase service 
Expert on: general management, leadership, consumer insight
May 2013 - June 2015
HaPhuong Crystal, JSC
Marketing manager
- Company imported crystal product from many countries such as vase,
wine glasses.
- Product sold for B2B and end consumers. 
- Entered many special holiday gifts for Mobifone, Viettel or annual
customer care for SHB Bank and many other SME organizations.
 - Built website, email marketing, offline POSM, delivery system. 
 Expert on: B2C consumer insight, internal relatives.
Aug 2012 - March 2013
Riverorchid Indochina Marketing Angency
Account Manager
- Built the client networks such as Ecopark, Holcim, Eximbank.
- Planned and pitched ideas for customer marketing master plan. 
- Collaborated with designer team and copywriter team to develop ideas
and plan.
- Joined and managed TVC operation for HUDA beer, EXIMBANK,
GAU DO noodles
 Expert on: Customer relationship manager, Agency media,
Apr 2010 - Aug 2011
Petrovietnam Construction Group
PR and Event Executive
- Planned a Master plan for Group in year 2011 include TVC, Press
Relation, Events ( grand opening, annual stock owner meeting) and
Mass Media (TV, Radios).
- Built new organization culture which applied on daily working
environment, how to deal with customer, client and colleague.
- Managing advertisement of PVC on VOV 90 MHZ daily on 7.15am to
5.30pm, Real estate show on  VCTV9 and some other Advs slot on
 InfoTV.
- Participate on PVC film for company
- Event execution in many ground breaking event, grand opening event
in more than 12 big projects all over Vietnam.
- Press relation before and after events.
 Expert on : high pressure job, national master event type, Press
relationship.
2012
IELTS Certificate with score 6.5
CERTIFICATIONS
Language
English, Vietnamese
Computer
Word, Excel, Powerpoint
SKILLS
© topcv.vn
Powered by TCPDF (www.tcpdf.org)
